info.title: prohandel third party API
info.description: Interface for third party companies to access and change data from the prohandel ERP. To get started please read the API documentation.

parameters.name: Page
parameters.description: Requested data is divided into pages. Default value is 1 and returns the first page.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: Amount of entites returned on a page. If ommited default value of 20 is used. If set value is too high, requests may time out.

parameters.description: Articles without a supplier are excluded it the paramater is not set to true

post.description:
Used to submit sales that are fully completed by an external system to the ERP.
This is for example used if articles are exported to an external marketplace like Amazon where the process of selling, payment and shipping are handled.

parameters.name: branch
parameters.description: Branch the sale is assigned to

requestBody.description: Sale data submitted in the request body

post.description:
Use this method to reverse any external sales created through api/v2/action/branch/{branch}/externalPayment.
This is used when the return of goods is handled by an external marketplace like Amazon and the ERP needs to be informed about the reversed sale.

parameters.name: branch
parameters.description: Branch the goods are returned to

requestBody.description: Return data submitted in the request body

post.description:
Use this method to cancel any external sales created through api/v2/action/branch/{branch}/externalPayment.
This is used when the cancelation of goods is handled by an external marketplace like Amazon and the ERP needs to be informed about the canceled sale.
Other than the api/v2/action/branch/{branch}/externalPaymentReturn call this call will result in an inventory cleanup

parameters.name: branch
parameters.description: Branch the cancelation is assigned to

requestBody.description: Cancelation data submitted in the request body

post.description:
Supplier returns created by this endpoint are stored in the database by default and must be manually imported and reviewed in the program 
'Lieferantenretoure' in the ERP before they are booked. To enable immediate booking without review use the option bookImmediately.

parameters.name: branch
parameters.description: Branch that wants to return the goods

parameters.name: bookImmediately
parameters.description: Flags the supplier return for immediate booking

requestBody.description: Data to process the return and identify the supplier

get.description:
Provides information on the current status of the internal sychronization between ERP and cloud.
A normal synchronization cycle runs every 15 seconds. This process may stall the timer for a short period in case many changes need to be synchronized.
A value older than an hour may indicate a (temporary) problem with the internal synchronization that needs to be taken care of.
